experience.position: Technical Lead, Android Center of Excellence
experience.description:
- Lead initiatives to reduce the development cycle time. 
- Support of legacy modules, including mobile development and Spring Boot microservices. 
- Tracking, detection and solution of complex production errors. 
- Jenkins pipelines modification. 
- Refactoring of the existing architecture by applying design patterns to ensure application scalability. 
- Create plans, lead the execution to achieve the objectives set by the corporation. 
- Lead Android community.

Working in complex Android native application and Spring Boot microservices for BCI Chilean Bank. 
- Experience using Dagger2, RxJava, Retrofit2, Animations 
- Participate on an application refactor to apply Clean Architecture with MVP pattern. 
- Unit testing with JUnit4, Robolectric, Mockito, DaggerMock. 
- Working with multimodule and multirooted project. 
- Working in an agile team using Scrum and Kanban. 
- Working using TDD. 
- Jenkins pipeline 
- Knowledge in the banking sector, about consumer loans and investments.

- Setup AWS SNS and AWS Cognito. 
- Integrating Android application with Cognito and receive push messages. 
- Use of Retrofit2, RxJava 
-Worked with MVP.

- Experience leading a team on 3 projects. 
- Extense experience with SOA and REST service 
- Worked with Oracle SOA Suite 11g and 12c, making service orchestration with Oracle Bussiness Rules, OSB and BPEL 
- Worked with IBM WebSphere Message Broker and IBM Toolkit. 
- Installed and Configure Jenkins CI to compile and deploy WAR and SOA Components. 
- Worked with Tomcat, Wildfly, and Weblogic. 
- Worked with Oracle DBMS 11g and 12c, SysBase, Postgress. 
- Experience with WSO2.

- Developed Android applications in diverse fields such as manipulating videos and photos, games, sports, blogs native apps. 
- Worked with Admob, In-app Billings, Interstitials, GCM, 
- Used third party libs like RxJava, Retrofit2, Gson, Butterknife. 
- Worked with Glide, Picasso, ImageLoader 
- Experience with Android NDK and FFmpeg Wrapper. 
- Worked with Camera 2 API. 
- Experience with OneSignal. 
- Install and setup Jenkins CI automatically build Android Applications in CentOS and Ubuntu EC2. 
- Worked with Android Studio and Eclipse ADT.

- Integrating OpenProdoc Document Management System with existing. 
- Creating a portable version of Galen Clinica Systems. 
- Establishing referential integrity between distributed Galen Clinica subsystems. 
- Changes in the architecture of Galen Clinics system to adapt to the latest versions of Grails framework. 
- Establishing unit testing and integration procedures. 
- Creating scripts for compressing javascript files to optimize time of 
Galen Clinicas start system.

experience.position: Software designer, Team Leader, Configuration Manager
experience.description:
- Team Leader of Galen Clinicas Admission Subsystems. Team size of 4 developers. 
- Analysis and design features related to revenues, expenditures, and movements of patients; in addition to hospital statistics. 
- Jenkins/Hudson CI Manager. 
- Establishment of the release process through Jenkins / Hudson. 
- Installation and configuration of Selenium Rc to run functional tests from Jenkins / Hudson.

- Features analysis and design related to prisoners treatment in the extramural system of the Venezuelan National Department Prison Services. (SIGEP) 
- Leading a development team of 5 programmers. 
- Training end-users and preparing to turn the system.

- Worked on the "Intramural System" of the Venezuelan National Department Prison Services. (SIGEP) version 1.0 as Data Access Developer using Spring and Hibernate frameworks Oracle DBMS 9g. 
- Participating in the creation of integration testing guidelines for the data access layer.
